name: Notification of New Appointment Booking
description: Notification sent when a new appointment has been scheduled and booked in the scheduling system
businessPurpose: Notify auxiliary applications and systems that a new appointment has been created and confirmed
timing: Sent immediately after a new appointment is successfully booked in the scheduling system
realWorldScenarios: Patient schedules office visit with primary care physician
Radiology appointment booked for CT scan
Surgery scheduling with operating room reservation

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - appointment accuracy critical for patient care coordination
